name: Crash Course (BeastKotathix, subbucket)
description:
Description:

As an expanded sequel to the game Take Flight!, you take your upgraded plane through an obstacle course and see how far you can get down the infinite tunnel!

Controls:

W/A - Pitch up or down

A/D - Roll left or right

Q/E- Yaw left or right

Space - Shoot

Key Features:

- Procedurally generated obstacles in your path

- Weave through the course using an out-of-control plane that can't slow down

- Shoot targets to open doors and break down walls

- Comes with 16 different main room types!

Credits:

- Artem Gulyaev

- Mark Braasch

- Catriona Barclay

University of Europe for Applied Sciences:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
